title: Voiceline Corporate Mundo desperatly needs:
body: When Mundo gets shut down gold while being behind "Mundo is back in Buisness."

replies.body: i would have pegged this for a respawn line, personally.
I mean, voice lines can be triggered by multiple events, right?
Hey that fits quite nice and I'm sure you'll hear the line much better than during a fight anyway.
But that would not be cash money.
I've never known that I needed this until now.
Yes I also need this so bad

Or if he revives after being shut down(Losing bounty). 

"Stocks are on the decline."
Absolutly awesome idea! Just a small add: "Mundo-Stocks" are on the decline.

IDK if there is a champ that has voicelines for shutdown gold, but considering that they have so many different things that can trigger voicelines (rally team from behind, kill X champ, move in a specific area, kill Y objective,...) it should be possible to implement it.
Please do!
Yes I also think this is possible, and it would be cool for a lot of other champs / skins as well!

> [{quoted}](name=Lordredstonenr1,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=NKX6kOXK,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-03-16T19:45:35.566+0000)
>
> IDK if there is a champ that has voicelines for shutdown gold, but considering that they have so many different things that can trigger voicelines (rally team from behind, kill X champ, move in a specific area, kill Y objective,...) it should be possible to implement it.
> Please do!

"When gaining shutdown gold and resetting own gold value"
